meanings.definition: Not frivolous; serious or sensible in nature.
meanings.sent1: She made an unfrivolous decision to save money for her future.
meanings.sent2: The unfrivolous discussion focused on important matters.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was a casual event, she maintained an unfrivolous demeanor.
meanings.sent4: His unfrivolous attitude towards work earned him respect from his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The unfrivolous tone of the meeting set the stage for productive conversations.
